originalText.text: Sail Sunset is an excellent company. We had a fantastic sail with wonderful crew members. Spence and David showed us a great time and were both very experienced. The entire process was very smooth, the boat was clean, and we didn't want to get off after our two hours was up! We can't recommend this company enough. Thanks again - we will be back!

text.text: Sail Sunset is an excellent company. We had a fantastic sail with wonderful crew members. Spence and David showed us a great time and were both very experienced. The entire process was very smooth, the boat was clean, and we didn't want to get off after our two hours was up! We can't recommend this company enough. Thanks again - we will be back!

originalText.text:
Sail Sunset provided the most intimate sailing experience of the harbor and Hudson River of all the boats I have sailed with in the past five years as a New Yorker. Captain James Brooks takes you deeper into the harbor than most other ships, offering you a better view of the city and Statue of Liberty. Unlike other ships that seat up to 30 people, the smaller size of the ship made it more personal - like our own private tour for the 6 of us.

We ended the night with the sunset, a popped bottle of champagne, and NYC showing off and flipping its lights on.

If you want a better sailing experience, book with Sail Sunset today.

A bientot, Captain Jimmy! French New Yorker approved!

originalText.text: I went sailing on Friday night and had an incredible time. We took the Rose and Oysters sunset trip and got to see wonderful views of the city and the Statue of Liberty on a beautiful evening. James was a great captain and ensured we all had a great time. Will definitely be going again!

text.text: I went sailing on Friday night and had an incredible time. We took the Rose and Oysters sunset trip and got to see wonderful views of the city and the Statue of Liberty on a beautiful evening. James was a great captain and ensured we all had a great time. Will definitely be going again!

originalText.text: Captain James helped me propose to my fiancé on the boat! He was very responsive and helped me plan every detail. She was very surprised and absolutely loved the romantic boat ride.  An amazing experience that we will cherish for the rest of our lives together!

text.text: Captain James helped me propose to my fiancé on the boat! He was very responsive and helped me plan every detail. She was very surprised and absolutely loved the romantic boat ride.  An amazing experience that we will cherish for the rest of our lives together!

originalText.text: My girlfriend and I had an incredible experience sailing with James and his sister. Unlike anything I’ve ever experienced living in NYC for the past 4+ years. James and his sister were extremely hospitable, knowledgeable, and a pleasure to be around. Pricing is extremely competitive and certainly worth every penny. Will definitely be back!
